Text: Thank you for reseeding and putting a great book back into circulation! I will reseed at least three times!

Downloaded this within an hour of being reseeded. It was uploaded for the first time within another hour. Read practically all of it in one sitting - just couldn't stop. A work that deserves a place among all memoirs, not just just the chess sub-category. Thank you, Djofullinn!
No problem, I aim to serve. Enjoy.
I've already seeded three times but have decided to go further. It would be great if Sosonko's two other books of memoirs were uploaded.

akalbabb, I have Smart Chip somewhere I remember, will upload when I find it.  My spoils are frankly mountainous after years of pirating but rather disorganized. Not sure about Reliable Past but I will look.
Thank you, Djofullinn. Will watch out for them.
